section.title: system.listMethods
section.para: Lists all RPC methods supported by the server.
Returns an array.

section.title: system.methodSignature
section.para: Returns signature of given method.

section.title: system.methodHelp
section.para: Print the help string for given method.

section.title: core.prints
section.para: Returns the strings given as parameters.
Returns an array.

section.title: core.printi
section.para: Returns the integers given as parameters.
Returns an array.

section.title: core.echo
section.para: Returns back its parameters.
Returns an array.

section.title: core.version
section.para: Returns the version string of the server.

section.title: core.flags
section.para: Returns the compile flags.

section.title: core.info
section.para: Verbose info, including version number, compile flags, compiler,repository hash a.s.o.

section.title: core.uptime
section.para: Returns uptime of SIP server.

section.title: core.ps
section.para: Returns the description of running processes.
Returns an array.

section.title: core.psx
section.para: Returns the detailed description of running processes.
Returns an array.

section.title: core.pwd
section.para: Returns the working directory of server.
Returns an array.

section.title: core.arg
section.para: Returns the list of command line arguments used on startup.
Returns an array.

section.title: core.kill
section.para: Sends the given signal to server.

section.title: core.shmmem
section.para: Returns shared memory info. It has an optional parameter that specifies the measuring unit: b - bytes (default), k or kb, m or mb, g or gb. Note: when using something different from bytes, the value is truncated.

section.title: core.tcp_info
section.para: Returns tcp related info.

section.title: core.tcp_options
section.para: Returns active tcp options.

section.title: core.tcp_list
section.para: Returns tcp connections details.

section.title: core.udp4_raw_info
section.para: Returns udp4_raw related info.

section.title: core.aliases_list
section.para: List local SIP server host aliases

section.title: core.sockets_list
section.para: List local SIP server listen sockets

section.title: dns.mem_info
section.para: dns cache memory info.

section.title: dns.debug
section.para: dns debug info.

section.title: dns.debug_all
section.para: complete dns debug dump

section.title: dns.view
section.para: dns cache dump in a human-readable format

section.title: dns.lookup
section.para: perform a dns lookup

section.title: dns.delete_all
section.para: deletes all the non-permanent entries from the DNS cache

section.title: dns.delete_all_force
section.para: deletes all the entries from the DNS cache including the permanent ones

section.title: dns.add_a
section.para: adds an A record to the DNS cache

section.title: dns.add_aaaa
section.para: adds an AAAA record to the DNS cache

section.title: dns.add_srv
section.para: adds an SRV record to the DNS cache

section.title: dns.delete_a
section.para: deletes an A record from the DNS cache

section.title: dns.delete_aaaa
section.para: deletes an AAAA record from the DNS cache

section.title: dns.delete_srv
section.para: deletes an SRV record from the DNS cache

section.title: dns.delete_naptr
section.para: deletes a NAPTR record from the DNS cache

section.title: dns.delete_cname
section.para: deletes a CNAME record from the DNS cache

section.title: dns.delete_txt
section.para: deletes a TXT record from the DNS cache

section.title: dns.delete_ebl
section.para: deletes an EBL record from the DNS cache

section.title: dns.delete_ptr
section.para: deletes an PTR record from the DNS cache

section.title: dst_blocklist.mem_info
section.para: dst blocklist memory usage info.

section.title: dst_blocklist.debug
section.para: dst blocklist debug info.

section.title: dst_blocklist.view
section.para: dst blocklist dump in human-readable format.

section.title: dst_blocklist.delete_all
section.para: Deletes all the entries from the dst blocklist except the permanent ones.

section.title: dst_blocklist.add
section.para: Adds a new entry to the dst blocklist.
